ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 1 |  | #P_nnz | |- ( N e. NN -> N e. ZZ ) |

| 3 |  | #P_pcdvdsb | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ N e. ZZ /\ 1 e. NN0 ) -> ( 1 <_ ( P pCnt N ) <-> ( P ^ 1 ) || N ) ) |

| 14 | 13 | #P_breq1d | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ N e. NN ) -> ( ( P ^ 1 ) || N <-> P || N ) ) |
